doc_class_description: A Court of Appeal judgment is a higher court ruling that reviews decisions of lower courts, shaping legal precedent and protecting citizens’ rights.

latest_doc_d.description: A.R.F.S. FANOON Vs SOUTH EASTERN UNIVERSITY OF SRI LANKA, and others before Hon. Dr. Sumudu Premachandra J.
latest_doc_d.parties: A.R.F.S. FANOON Vs SOUTH EASTERN UNIVERSITY OF SRI LANKA, and others
latest_doc_d.keywords: Appointment of Lecturer (Probationary) , best suited candidate to be selected. Courts are "slow and circumspect" in interfering with academic decisions, Availability of alternate remedy
latest_doc_d.legistation: Article 140 of the Constitution of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka. Section 86(a) of the Universities Act No. 16 of 1978.
